server_url.title: Gerrit Server URL
server_url.description: The URL of the Gerrit server (e.g., https://gerrit.example.com)

password.title: HTTP Password
password.description: HTTP password from Gerrit account settings

password.title: HTTP Password
password.description: HTTP password from Gerrit account settings

reject_unauthorized.title: Enable certificate validation
reject_unauthorized.description: Enable certificate validation for the Gerrit server

projects.title: Projects list
projects.description: List of Gerrit projects from which to fetch data. If none passed, all visible projects will be used.

excluded_projects.title: Excluded Projects list
excluded_projects.description: List of Gerrit projects from which data won't be fetched. By default, no projects are excluded.

cutoff_days.title: Cutoff Days
cutoff_days.description: Only fetch data updated after cutoff

page_size.title: Page Size
page_size.description: Maximum number of items in a paginated response

timeout.title: Request Timeout
timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for each request to the Gerrit API

concurrency_limit.title: Concurrency limit
concurrency_limit.description: Maximum number of concurrent API requests

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which to start syncing data. If not specified, uses cutoff_days to calculate the start date.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: The date at which to stop syncing data. If not specified, uses the current date.
